channel.title: controlport unix sockets
channel.description:
We may want to keep an eye on controlports moving to unix sockets:
> In the glorious future, maybe Tor packages will default to using > an abstract unix ControlSocket: > https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/20337 > and then they wouldn't be tempted to using ControlPorts at all.
> --Roger
https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/20337

item.title: controlport unix sockets
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix 14 will be using control socket only. [already done]

Read full topic

item.title: controlport unix sockets
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
We may want to keep an eye on controlports moving to unix sockets:

In the glorious future, maybe Tor packages will default to using
an abstract unix ControlSocket:
https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/20337
and then they wouldn’t be tempted to using ControlPorts at all.

–Roger

https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/20337

Read full topic
